src_text: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref_text: Long 1976, em i givim edvais long Carter long 'foreign policy', na bihain em i kisim ples bilong Henry Kissinger na wok olsem National Security Advisor (NSA) long yia 1977 i go long 1981.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

src_text: Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters.
ref_text: Stat long 1988 na i kam inap long nau, olgeta 'ballot box' i mas i stap ples klia na ol lain bilong vot (vote) na ol lain bilong was long vot i ken lukim olsem i no gat envelop (envelope) i stap long stat bilong vot na i no gat narapela envelop ol i putim gen i go antap long ol envelop we ol i kaunim pinis na olgeta i kam long ol lain we i gat atoriti long vot.
hyp_text: Long 1988, ballot boxes i bin i stap 'transparent' olsem ol i no stap 'envelope' long stap insait long stap bilong vota na ol i no stap 'envelope' long stap olsem ol i no stap insait long stap bilong vota, tasol long stap bilong ol 'duly counted' na 'authorized voters'.

src_text: Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
ref_text: Ol kendidet (candidate) i ken salim ol lain we i makim ol long go na witnesim olgeta wanwan hap bilong wok. Long avinun, ol volentia (volunteer) i save kaunim ol vot (vote) na i gat ol lain i save bihainim ol prosidia (procedure) bilong supavaisim (supervise) wok bilong ol.
hyp_text: Kandidet we i laik long go, em i inap long sen ol representet long ol i go antap long oltaim bilong proses. Long taim bilong nait, ol vot bilong em i bin kauntim long ol volunti long insait long oltaim bilong supervizian, long dispela taim bilong ol i fololim ol prosedur spesifik.

[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

src_text: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors.
ref_text: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger i sainim wanpela 'bill' na mekim em i kamap olsem lo tru tru we i stopim ol lain long salim o rentim o geim (game) bilong pait i go long ol pikinini.
hyp_text: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger i signim long law wanpela bil bilong i banim sale na rental bilong ol 'violent video games' long olgeta 'minors'.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.

[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.

src_text: The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading "18" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense.
ref_text: Dispela 'bill' em i tok olsem ol vidio geim (video game) bilong pait we ol i salim long Carlifonia em ol i mas makim wantaimwanpela 'decal reading' "18" na mekim ol lain i brukim dispela lo long baim $1000 long wanwan taim ol i brukim dispela lo.
hyp_text: Ol 'bill' em i requireim ol 'video games' we i kamap strongpela na i stap long 'state' bilong California na i inap long stap 'decal' bilong 18 na i inap long salim 'sale' bilong em long wanpela 'minor' na i inap long finisim em long wanpela 'fine' bilong $1000 long wanpela 'offense'.

[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

src_text: A civilization is a singular culture shared by a significant large group of people who live and work co-operatively, a society.
ref_text: Wanpela 'civilization' em i wanpela kalsa we wanpela bikpela lain manmeri husat i save stap wantaim na wok wantaim i serim, em i wanpela 'society'.
hyp_text: Olgeta 'civilization' i wanpela kainpela kainpela 'culture' we i share long wanpela hap bilong ples we i stap long, olgeta manmeri we i stap na wok long olgeta kainpela wok, olgeta 'society'.

src_text: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
ref_text: Dispela hap tok 'civilization' em i kam long wanpela tok Latin 'civilis', em i min olsem 'civil', na em i wankain olsem narapela tok Latin 'civis', mining bilong en em 'citizen', na 'civitas', mining bilong en em siti o 'city-state', na dispela tu em i toktok long sais bilong 'society'.
hyp_text: Wanpela wod we i stap long 'English' em i stap long 'Latin' long 'civilis', olsem 'civil', we i stap long 'civis', olsem 'citizen', na 'civitas', olsem 'city' na 'city-state', na em i stap long 'size' bilong 'society'.

src_text: City-states are the precursors of nations. A civilizational culture implies the passing on of knowledge across several generations, a lingering cultural footprint and fair dissemination.
ref_text: Ol 'city-states' em ol samting we i save kamapim wanpela kantri. Insait long wanpela 'civilizational culture' em ol lain i save givim save bilong ol i go long sampela 'generation', wanpela kain 'footprint' bilong kalsa we i save stap na rot bilong givim save long ol narapela.
hyp_text: City-states em i wanpela taim we i kamap olsem wanpela nesen. Wanpela 'civilizational culture' em i mekim i pasim olsem ol i stap i go long oltaunpela generasen, wanpela 'lingering cultural footprint' na wanpela 'fair dissemination'.

src_text: Congress lacked any power to impose taxes, and, because there was no national executive or judiciary, it relied on state authorities, who were often uncooperative, to enforce all its acts.
ref_text: Congress i no gat pawa long makim na kisim takis, na, bikos i bin no gat 'national executive' o 'judiciary', em i save yusim ol 'state authorities', husat i no save wok wantaim em long planti taim, long mekim ol manmeri i bihainim ol 'act' bilong em.
hyp_text: Kongres i no i stap long olgeta pawa bilong im i mekim tasol, na, olsem ol i no i stap long ol pawa bilong en, na ol i stap long ol 'state authorities' we i stap long olgeta pawa bilong ol, na ol i stap long stap long olgeta 'enforce' bilong ol 'acts' we ol i stap long mekim.

src_text: It also had no authority to override tax laws and tariffs between states.

src_text: The Articles required unanimous consent from all the states before they could be amended and states took the central government so lightly that their representatives were often absent.

src_text: In 1683, Qing dynasty (1644-1912) forces take control of Taiwan’s western and northern coastal areas and declared Taiwan as a province of the Qing Empire in 1885.

src_text: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.
ref_text: 'Up' em i min olsem yu mas stat long 'tip' na pusim 'bow', na 'down' em i min olsem yu mas stat long 'frog' (dispela em i ples we han bilong yu i holim 'bow') na pulim dispela 'bow'.
hyp_text: Up bilong yu i mekim yu i start long tip na yu i pulim bow, na down bilong yu i mekim yu i start long frog (we i stap long wanpela hand bilong yu we i holim bow) na yu i pulim bow.

src_text: Subsistence agriculture is a simple, often organic, system using saved seed native to the ecoregion combined with crop rotation or other relatively simple techniques to maximize yield.
ref_text: 'Subsistence agriculture' em i wanpela sistem we i no yusim planti samting, i no yusim marasin, i yusim sit we ol i kisim long kaikai we i gro long dispela rijen na ol i bungim dispela ol pasin wantaim pasin bilong mekim 'crop rotation' o ol narapela isipela teknik (technique) bilong mekim kaikai i kamap planti.
hyp_text: Subsistence agriculture i wanpela sistem we i stap i gat olsem wanpela 'simple', ofensim 'organic', sistem we i yusim 'saved seed' we i stap i stap long ecoregion bilong yu, i stap insait long ol 'crop rotation' na olsem olsem 'relatively simple techniques' bilong yu na olsem i i makim olsem 'maximize yield'.

hyp_text: Our foster care system i mekim supaem bilong i bin mekim savepela 'homes', 'loving caregivers', 'stable education', na 'reliable health care'.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

src_text: Foster care is supposed to provide all the necessities that were lacking in the home they were previously taken from.

hyp_text: Foster care i supam olsem i save pavin ol nesisiti bilong em we i no stap long ol hap ol i go long bihain.

src_text: The distinct characteristics of the Internet lead to additional dimensions in terms of the uses and gratifications approach.
ref_text: Dispela ol pasin bilong intanet i save givim nupela save long wanem we yumi ken yusim ‌intanet na kisim amamas.

src_text: “Personal involvement” and “continuing relationships” were also identified as new motivation aspects by Eighmey and McCord (1998) when they investigated audience reactions to websites.

src_text: Sleep interruption is the process of purposefully awakening during your normal sleep period and falling asleep a short time later (10–60 minutes).

src_text: A binary number can have only one of two values, i.e. 0 or 1, and these numbers are referred to as binary digits - or bits, to use computer jargon.
ref_text: Wanpela 'binary number' em i ken i gat tupela velu (value), dispela em i 0 o 1, na ol dispela namba em ol i save kolim olsem ol 'binary digit' - o 'bits' long toktok bilong komputa.
hyp_text: Wanpela 'binary number' i no save inap i gat long wanpela bilong tu valu, i.e. 0 na 1, na dispela namba i bin referim olsem binary digits - na ol i bin brukim 'computer jargon' na kolim olsem 'bits'.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

src_text: The surface of the Moon is made of rocks and dust. The outer layer of the Moon is called the crust.

src_text: The Oyapock River Bridge is a cable-stayed bridge. It spans the Oyapock River to link the cities of Oiapoque in Brazil and Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock in French Guiana.
ref_text: Oyapock River Bridge em i wanpelad 'cable-stayed bridge'. Em i stap long Oyapock River na konektim ol siti bilong Oiapoque insait long Brazil na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock insait long French Guiana.
hyp_text: The Oyapock River Bridge i wanpela 'cable-stayed bridge'. Em i go long ol narapela sida bilong Oyapock River long ol bikpela 'link' long ol sity bilong Oiapoque long Brazil na Saint-Georges de l'Oyapock long French Guiana.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.

[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.

src_text: The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture.

src_text: In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called "The Giant Province of the Indies", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups.

hyp_text: Ol festival i gat olkostem kampaing areia long famili we i gat pikinini bilong yusim long samting.
prompt:
[English]: Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.
[Tok Pisin]: Maski long dispela, olgeta lain long Belgium na Switzerland we i save yusim French i save lainim 'standard French' insait long skul, olsem na ol bai i inap long save maski yu yusim namba sistem bilong 'standard French'.
[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.
[English]: Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World.
[Tok Pisin]: Taim em i stat i kam inap nau, The Onion i kamap olsem wanpela pablikesen bilong mekim fani long nius, wantaim wanpela niuspepa, wanpela websait we i kisim 5,000,000 kainkain visita insait long mun bilong Oktoba, ol 'personal ads', wanpela 24 aua nius, ol 'podcast', na wanpela soim wanpela 'world atlas' we ol i kolim olsem Our Dumb World.

src_text: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected.
ref_text: Sapos ol i brukim Northern Baltic long winta (winter), sekim lokesen bilong 'cabin', bikos taim em i go namel long ais em i kamap wanpela bikpela nois long ol hap we i bamim ais.
hyp_text: Maski yu go long 'crossing' long Northern Baltic long winter, yu bai inap checkim ol cabin, olsem i no go long 'cabin' insait long ice, tasol i go long 'cabin' we i no go long ice i no go inap i gat ol 'noise' na i gat ol 'noise' i go long ol 'most affected'.

[English]: Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea.
[Tok Pisin]: Long planti 'century' i go pinis, ol manmeri i bin bildim ol fletpela eria long ol ples we i no stret, ol ples we i sanap i go antap i go long 'cliff' we i lukluk i go long solwara.
[English]: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska.
[Tok Pisin]: 800-pela 'miles' bilong dispela Trans-Alaska Pipeline System em ol i bin pasim bihain long 'crude oil' i bin kapsait long tausenpela dram long hap saut bilong Fairbanks, long Alaska.
[English]: Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution.
[Tok Pisin]: Ol sampelaa hap bilong Belgiun long tude i bin stap olsem hap bilong Luxembourg long bipo, tasol em i kamap ol hap bilong Belgium bihain long Belgian Revolution we i kamap long ol yia insait long 1830.

src_text: In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country.
